metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15385 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The store_versioninfo_gnu_verdef function in libr/bin/format/elf/elf.c in radare2 2.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (r_read_le16 invalid write and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted ELF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-2.3 - 2.3.0+dfsg-1
libradare2-common - 2.3.0+dfsg-1
radare2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0+dfsg-1').
